summary: An account of the events before and after a murder committed by Peter Egermann (Robert Atzorn), a disturbed businessman in a strained marriage, and what led Peter to perform such a shocking act.
cast: Robert Atzorn|Christine Buchegger|Martin Benrath|Rita Russek|Lola Müthel|Walter Schmidinger|Heinz Bennent|Ruth Olafs|Karl-Heinz Pelser|Gaby Dohm|Toni Berger|Erwin Faber|Heino Hallhuber|Doris Jensen|Paul Bürks
title: De la vida de las marionetas
